Description: Lower wall and foot sherd of Attic or East Greek pottery thin-walled bowl; low ring foot; wholly glazed save underside; traces of added purple band near top on outside; inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: the clay has perhaps a little too mica mica for an Attic piece
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 576)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GS.477)
